name: Redirect to Scratch project
code: javascript:var Scratch_Project_Id = prompt("Write the Number of the Scratch Project you would like to go to"); window.location.href="https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/"+Scratch_Project_Id+"/";

name: Redirect to Scratch user
code: javascript:var user = prompt("What User Do You want to go to?"); window.location.href="https://scratch.mit.edu/users/"+user+"/";
